name: news-agent-project
description: AI Agent for generating articles with human-in-the-loop approval

scripts.dev: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File kill-port.ps1 && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul && tsx watch server.ts
scripts.dev:clean: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File kill-port.ps1 && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul && tsx watch server.ts
scripts.start:windows: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File kill-port.ps1 && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul && tsx server.ts
scripts.start:clean: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File kill-port.ps1 && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul && tsx server.ts
